Reception given by Iranian ambassador
articles.content:
Reception given by Iranian ambassador 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Iranian ambassador to Korea Mohammad Ganjidoost arranged a reception at the embassy yesterday on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of the victory of the Iranian Islamic revolution.
 Present on invitation were Minister of Labour Ri Won Il who is chairman of the Korea-Iran Friendship Association, other officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys here.    
 Speeches were made at the reception.

This year's action program of Hanchongryon announced
articles.content:
This year's action program of Hanchongryon announced 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Hon, interim chairman of the 9th-term South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) in a press conference on Feb. 4 announced its action program for this year, according to a news report.
 He said that this year hanchongryon will wage an allout struggle against the anti-reunification forces and popularize the campaign in a bid to open a decisive phase of reunification through the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration.    
 Hanchongryon will set a period from June 15 to August 15 as a period of the campaign for promoting national reunification and conduct various and powerful campaigns for reunification in this period, he declared.

articles.title: Total revision of SFA called for
articles.content:
Total revision of SFA called for 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The people's action for revision of the shackling South Korea-U.S. "status of forces agreement" at a press conference on Feb. 5 urged a total revision of the unequal provisions of the agreement and a revision of the South Korea-U.S. "mutual defense pact," the source of the inequality, the South Korean newspaper Hangyore said.
 The organization decided to hold a one-by-one demonstration in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul for the one month of February.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian foreign minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian foreign minister 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to his Russian counterpart Igor Sergeyevich Ivanov on the occasion of the first anniversary of the DPRK-Russia treaty of friendship, good neighbourliness and cooperation.
 The message said that the signing of the new treaty provided a firm legal groundwork to develop the bilateral relations on to a new higher level.    
 Convinced that the traditional friendly relations between the two countries would expand and develop in all fields in the spirit of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration and this treaty inked by the heads of the two countries, Paek Nam Sun wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il receives Chinese party delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il receives Chinese party delegation 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il today received a delegation of the international liaison department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China led by Wang Jiarui on a visit to Korea. This is the first visit to Korea of Wang since he was appointed as deputy head for Korean affairs of the CPC international liaison department.
 Present on the occasion were secretary of the WPK Central Committee Kim Kuk Thae, director of the international department of the C.C., the WPK Kim Yang Gon, generals of the Korean People's Army Hyon Chol Hae and Pak Jae Gyong and Chinese ambassador to the DPRK Wang Guozhng. 
 Leader Kim Jong Il expressed thanks again for the sincere and kind guidance given to him during his recent unofficial china visit, and conversed with the guests in a cordial and friendly atmosphere.    
 He gave a luncheon for the visitors.
